item.title: Markdown and Shortcodes
item.description: Thanks! Special thanks to Markdown Cheatsheet. link nach unten: Verbesserung Kosten CHANGELOG: 1.2.2020: hugo-extended v0.59.1 => Version 0.63.2 x@meine-skills.at H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Alt-H1 Alt-H2 # H1 ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6 Alt-H1 ====== Alt-H2 ------ Emphasis, aka italics, with asterisks or underscores. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with asterisks or underscores. Combined emphasis with asterisks and underscores. Strikethrough uses two tildes. Scratch this.
